mobileBranding.description: Mobile manufacturer or branded name (e.g: Samsung, HTC, Verizon, T-Mobile, Apple)

mobileModel.description: Mobile device model (e.g.: Nexus S, iPhone, iPad, SM-G935F)

mobileName.description: Mobile device brand and model (e.g. Galaxy S8, iPhone 6)

operatingSystem.description: Device operating system (e.g. Windows, Android, iOS)

operatingSystemVersion.description: The version of the operating system

isMobileApp.description: True if mobile app is being used
